rent_a_car.description: 7-days rental car available for an extra Dhs 173.25.
rent_a_car.help_text: If you select this add-on AXA will provide you with a rental car for a maximum of 7 days in case of an accident.

road_side_assistance.help_text: Check out this help doc on roadside assistance for more info.

pab_driver.description: Personal accident benefit for driver available for an extra Dhs 126.00.
pab_driver.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the driver (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_passenger.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers employed by you available for an extra Dhs 31.50 per passenger.
pab_passenger.help_text: The total additional premium is calculated on the no. of passenger seats. Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_family_and_friends.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers who are family and friends incl.
pab_family_and_friends.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death. Passengers who are employed by you are excluded.

fire_and_theft_cover.description: Fire damage and theft cover incl.

natural_disaster.description: Storm and flood damage cover incl.
natural_disaster.help_text: This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

riot_and_strike.description: Riot and strike damage cover incl.
riot_and_strike.help_text: This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: Windscreen, windows & sunroof damage cover limited to Dhs 5,000 incl.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: AXA will cover the cost of replacing/repairing a damaged windscreen, windows or sunroof. Up until Dhs 5,000 AXA will not charge you any excess. Any claim made under this cover will not affect your no-claims history.

emergency_medical_expenses.description: Emergency medical expenses covered up to Dhs 3,500.
emergency_medical_expenses.help_text: This is the maximum that the insurer will pay out for the immediate medical expenses to an injured occupant of the car if it has been in an accident.

personal_belongings.description: Personal belongings covered up to Dhs 4,000.
personal_belongings.help_text: This is compensation for the loss or damage to personal belongings by fire, theft or accident. A police report will be required.

replacement_keys_and_locks.description: Replacement of locks for damaged locks or stolen keys incl.
replacement_keys_and_locks.help_text: AXA will not charge you any excess and your no-claims history will be unaffected if your locks need to be replaced.

oman_cover.help_text: Oman cover for own damage and third party liability are both included in this policy.

off_road_cover.help_text: 4x4 vehicles with off-road capability only! This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

ambulance_cover.description: Ambulance transportation covered up to Dhs 6,770 per injured person.

third_party_property_damage.description: Third party property damage cover of up to Dhs 3,500,000 incl.

third_party_bodily_injury.description: Third party bodily injury covered as per UAE court award.

rent_a_car.description: Car rental reimbursement available for an extra Dhs 173.25.
rent_a_car.help_text: If you select this add-on AXA will reimburse you for up to Dhs 1,500 in car rental costs for a maximum of 7 days in case of an accident.

road_side_assistance.help_text: Check out this help doc on roadside assistance for more info.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: No special windscreen, windows or sunroof damage cover.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: Windscreen & windows damage cover limited to Dhs 2,500 incl.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: EIC will cover the cost of replacing/repairing damaged windscreen or windows. Up until Dhs 2,500 EIC will not charge you any excess and any claim made under this cover will not affect your no-claims history.

emergency_medical_expenses.description: Emergency medical expenses covered up to Dhs 2,000.
emergency_medical_expenses.help_text: This is the maximum that the insurer will pay out for the immediate medical expenses to an injured occupant of the car if it has been in an accident.

personal_belongings.description: Personal belongings covered up to Dhs 2,000.
personal_belongings.help_text: This is compensation for the loss or damage to personal belongings by fire, theft or accident. A police report will be required.

oman_cover.description: Oman cover available for an extra Dhs 630.00.
oman_cover.help_text: If you select this add-on you will get coverage in Oman for own damage and third party liability.

ambulance_cover.description: Ambulance transportation covered up to Dhs 6,770 per injured person.

third_party_property_damage.description: Third party property damage cover of up to Dhs 2,000,000 incl.

third_party_bodily_injury.description: Third party bodily injury covered as per UAE court award.

rent_a_car.description: 7-days rental car available for an extra Dhs 157.50.
rent_a_car.help_text: If you select this add-on IH will provide you with a rental car for a maximum of 7 days in case of an accident.

road_side_assistance.help_text: Check out this help doc on roadside assistance for more info.

pab_driver.description: Personal accident benefit for driver available for an extra Dhs 126.00.
pab_driver.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the driver (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_passenger.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers employed by you available for an extra Dhs 31.50 per passenger.
pab_passenger.help_text: The total additional premium is calculated on the no. of passenger seats. Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_family_and_friends.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers who are family and friends incl.
pab_family_and_friends.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death. Passengers who are employed by you are excluded.

fire_and_theft_cover.description: Fire damage and theft cover incl.

natural_disaster.description: Storm and flood damage cover incl.
natural_disaster.help_text: Flood damage is only covered if your car is not driven. This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

riot_and_strike.description: No coverage for riot and strike damage.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: Windscreen damage cover limited to Dhs 2,000 incl.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: IH will cover the cost (up to Dhs 2,000) of replacing/repairing a damaged windscreen and they will not charge you any excess. However, your no-claims history will be affected.

emergency_medical_expenses.description: Emergency medical expenses covered up to Dhs 2,000.
emergency_medical_expenses.help_text: This is the maximum that the insurer will pay out for the immediate medical expenses to an injured occupant of the car if it has been in an accident.

personal_belongings.description: Personal belongings covered up to Dhs 1,000.
personal_belongings.help_text: This is compensation for the loss or damage to personal belongings by fire, theft or accident. A police report will be required.

oman_cover.help_text: No coverage in Oman in this policy so you'll have to purchase insurance at the border if you plan to take your car there.

ambulance_cover.description: Ambulance transportation covered up to Dhs 6,770 per injured person.

third_party_property_damage.description: Third party property damage cover of up to Dhs 2,000,000 incl.

third_party_bodily_injury.description: Third party bodily injury covered as per UAE court award.

rent_a_car.description: Car rental reimbursement available for an extra Dhs 225.75.
rent_a_car.help_text: If you select this add-on, in case of an accident OIC will reimburse you for up to Dhs 100 per day in car rental costs for a maximum of 7 days per claim and 2 claims per year. The total reimbursement is capped at Dhs 700 per year.

road_side_assistance.help_text: Check out this help doc on roadside assistance for more info.

pab_driver.description: Personal accident benefit for driver incl.
pab_driver.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the driver (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_passenger.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers employed by you incl.
pab_passenger.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death.

pab_family_and_friends.description: Personal accident benefit for passengers who are family and friends incl.
pab_family_and_friends.help_text: Maximum cover of up to Dhs 200,000. This compensation will be paid to the passenger(s) (or their next-of-kin) in the event of an accident causing disability or death. Passengers who are employed by you are excluded.

fire_and_theft_cover.description: Fire damage and theft cover incl.

natural_disaster.description: Storm and flood damage cover incl.
natural_disaster.help_text: Flood damage is only covered if your car is not driven. This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

riot_and_strike.description: Riot and strike damage cover incl.
riot_and_strike.help_text: This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and does not cover third parties.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: Windscreen & windows damage cover limited to Dhs 3,000 incl.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: OIC will cover the cost of replacing/repairing damaged a windscreen or windows. Up until Dhs 3,000 OIC will not charge you any excess. However, your no-claims history will be affected.

emergency_medical_expenses.description: Emergency medical expenses covered up to Dhs 5,000.
emergency_medical_expenses.help_text: This is the maximum that the insurer will pay out for the immediate medical expenses to an injured occupant of the car if it has been in an accident.

personal_belongings.description: Personal belongings covered up to Dhs 5,000.
personal_belongings.help_text: This is compensation for the loss or damage to personal belongings by fire, theft or accident. A police report will be required.

replacement_keys_and_locks.description: Replacement of locks covered up to Dhs 1,000 for lost or stolen keys.
replacement_keys_and_locks.help_text: OIC will charge you your excess and your no-claims history will be affected.

oman_cover.help_text: Oman cover for own damage and third party liability are both included in this policy. Let us know before you go to Oman so that we can get you your free certificate of insurance.

off_road_cover.help_text: 4x4 vehicles with off-road capability only! This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and not third parties. Dune bashing is NOT covered. Double the normal excess for off-road damage! Please make sure you read OIC's terms and conditions for more info.

third_party_property_damage.description: Third party property damage cover of up to Dhs 3,500,000 incl.

natural_disaster.description: No cover for storm and flood damage.

riot_and_strike.description: No cover for riot and strike damage.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: No special cover for windscreen & glass damage.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: This policy doesn't make any special provisions for windscreen or glass damage. This means that if your windscreen or windows get damaged your standard policy conditions will apply. You'll be charged your excess and your no-claims history will be affected.

windscreen_and_glass_damage.description: Windscreen & glass damage cover limited to Dhs 3,000 incl.
windscreen_and_glass_damage.help_text: In case of windscreen or windows damage of up until Dhs 3,000 QIC will not charge you any excess. Up to 1 claim made under this cover will not affect your no-claims history.

oman_cover.help_text: QIC covers own damage in the parts of Oman that fall within the borders of the UAE. However, for all intents and purposes there is no coverage in Oman in this policy so you'll have to purchase insurance at the border if you plan to take your car there.

off_road_cover.help_text: 4x4 vehicles with off-road capability only! This coverage is for damage caused to your own vehicle and not third parties. Dune bashing is NOT covered. Additional excess of Dhs 1,000 for off-road damage! Please make sure you read QIC's terms and conditions for more info.

third_party_property_damage.description: Third party property damage cover of up to Dhs 2,000,000 incl.
